newsitem.title: USA: Autonomous Tech obtains VISX license.
newsitem.headline: Autonomous Tech obtains VISX license.

text.p: Autonomous Technologies Corp said it has entered into a patent license agreement with VISX Inc for the use of certain VISX patents for laser vision correction outside of the United States.
Patent lawsuits in the United Kingdom between the two companies will be dismissed as a result of the license agreement, Autonomous said.

The company reported that the license agreement grants Autonomous a non-exclusive worldwide license, excluding the United States, for the use of VISX patents for ultraviolet laser vision correction, Autonomous said.
The license encompasses payment of equipment royalties on a per machine basis, Autonomous said.
